mapper.insert: insert into spon(user_no, artist_no, spon_date, price, status, type, board_no, purchase_unique, receipt_id, purchase_data, purchase_status) VALUES (#{user_no}, #{artist_no}, #{spon_date}, #{price}, #{status}, #{type}, #{board_no}, #{unique}, #{receipt_id}, #{purchase_data}, #{purchase_status})
mapper.select: select * from spon WHERE user_no=#{user_no}, artist_no=#{artist_no}, spon_date=#{spon_date}
